title: How to Make Time in Little Alchemy 2: Tips & Recipes

steps.title: Discover 100 elements to unlock Time.
steps.content: Discover 100 elements to unlock Time. This happens automatically after the 100th item is discovered. Once you have Time, you can create dozens of other elements. [1] X Research source Tip : Keep one element on the workspace and drag-and-drop every other available element to check for possible combinations. There are 720 possible elements to unlock in Little Alchemy 2 . You can create electricity , evil , wood , life , and more.

steps.title: When Time is unlocked, you can create elements affected by time.
steps.content: When Time is unlocked, you can create elements affected by time. Here are a few popular elements you can create: Time + Juice = Alcohol Time + Campfire = Ash Time + Milk = Cheese Time + Life = Death Time + Lizard = Dinosaur Time + Animal = Human Time + Primordial Soup = Life
